sortable/default.highlightedCode:
"use client"

import * as React from "react"
import { Badge } from "@/components/ui/badge"
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
import {
  Sortable,
  SortableContent,
  SortableItem,
  SortableItemHandle,
  SortableOverlay,
} from "@/components/ui/sortable"
import { GripVertical } from "lucide-react"

interface Task {
  id: string
  title: string
  priority: "low" | "medium" | "high"
  status: "pending" | "in-progress" | "completed"
}

export default function Component() {
  const [tasks, setTasks] = React.useState<Task[]>([
    {
      id: "1",
      title: "Add authentication",
      priority: "high",
      status: "pending",
    },
    {
      id: "2",
      title: "Create API endpoints",
      priority: "medium",
      status: "in-progress",
    },
    {
      id: "3",
      title: "Write documentation",
      priority: "low",
      status: "completed",
    },
    {
      id: "4",
      title: "Design system updates",
      priority: "high",
      status: "pending",
    },
    {
      id: "5",
      title: "Implement dark mode",
      priority: "medium",
      status: "in-progress",
    },
  ])

  return (
    <Sortable
      value={tasks}
      onValueChange={setTasks}
      getItemValue={(item) => item.id}
    >
      <SortableContent className="flex flex-col gap-2">
        {tasks.map((task) => (
          <TaskCard key={task.id} task={task} />
        ))}
      </SortableContent>
      <SortableOverlay>
        <div className="rounded-md bg-muted/60 size-full" />
      </SortableOverlay>
    </Sortable>
  )
}

interface TaskCardProps
  extends Omit<React.ComponentProps<typeof SortableItem>, "value" | "children"> {
  task: Task
  asHandle?: boolean
}

function TaskCard({ task, asHandle, ...props }: TaskCardProps) {
  const cardContent = (
    <div className="rounded-md border bg-card p-3 shadow-xs">
      <div className="flex items-center justify-between gap-2">
        <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
          <span className="font-medium text-sm">{task.title}</span>
          <Badge
            variant={
              task.priority === "high"
                ? "destructive"
                : task.priority === "medium"
                  ? "primary"
                  : "secondary"
            }
            className="pointer-events-none h-5 rounded-sm px-1.5 text-[11px] capitalize"
          >
            {task.priority}
          </Badge>
        </div>
        <Badge
          variant={
            task.status === "completed"
              ? "outline"
              : task.status === "in-progress"
                ? "primary"
                : "secondary"
          }
          className="pointer-events-none h-5 rounded-sm px-1.5 text-[11px] capitalize"
        >
          {task.status}
        </Badge>
      </div>
    </div>
  )

  return (
    <SortableItem value={task.id} {...props}>
      {asHandle ? (
        <SortableItemHandle asChild>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <Button variant="ghost" size="sm" mode="icon">
              <GripVertical />
            </Button>
            {cardContent}
          </div>
        </SortableItemHandle>
      ) : (
        <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
          <SortableItemHandle asChild>
            <Button variant="ghost" size="sm" mode="icon">
              <GripVertical />
            </Button>
          </SortableItemHandle>
          {cardContent}
        </div>
      )}
    </SortableItem>
  )
}

sortable/grid.highlightedCode:
"use client"

import * as React from "react"
import { Badge } from "@/components/ui/badge"
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
import {
  Sortable,
  SortableContent,
  SortableItem,
  SortableItemHandle,
  SortableOverlay,
} from "@/components/ui/sortable"
import { GripVertical } from "lucide-react"

interface Card {
  id: string
  title: string
  description: string
  category: "design" | "development" | "marketing"
  priority: "low" | "medium" | "high"
}

export default function Component() {
  const [cards, setCards] = React.useState<Card[]>([
    {
      id: "1",
      title: "Homepage Redesign",
      description: "Update the main landing page with new design system",
      category: "design",
      priority: "high",
    },
    {
      id: "2",
      title: "API Integration",
      description: "Connect third-party services to our backend",
      category: "development",
      priority: "medium",
    },
    {
      id: "3",
      title: "Email Campaign",
      description: "Launch promotional email for new features",
      category: "marketing",
      priority: "low",
    },
    {
      id: "4",
      title: "Mobile App",
      description: "Develop native mobile application",
      category: "development",
      priority: "high",
    },
    {
      id: "5",
      title: "Brand Guidelines",
      description: "Create comprehensive brand documentation",
      category: "design",
      priority: "medium",
    },
    {
      id: "6",
      title: "Social Media",
      description: "Manage all social media accounts",
      category: "marketing",
      priority: "low",
    },
  ])

  return (
    <Sortable
      value={cards}
      onValueChange={setCards}
      getItemValue={(item) => item.id}
    >
      <SortableContent strategy="grid" className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
        {cards.map((card) => (
          <CardItem key={card.id} card={card} />
        ))}
      </SortableContent>
      <SortableOverlay>
        <div className="rounded-md bg-muted/60 size-full" />
      </SortableOverlay>
    </Sortable>
  )
}

interface CardItemProps
  extends Omit<React.ComponentProps<typeof SortableItem>, "value" | "children"> {
  card: Card
  asHandle?: boolean
}

function CardItem({ card, asHandle, ...props }: CardItemProps) {
  const cardContent = (
    <div className="rounded-md border bg-card p-4 shadow-xs">
      <div className="flex flex-col gap-3">
        <div className="flex items-start justify-between gap-2">
          <h3 className="font-semibold text-sm leading-tight">{card.title}</h3>
          <SortableItemHandle asChild>
            <Button variant="ghost" size="sm" mode="icon">
              <GripVertical />
            </Button>
          </SortableItemHandle>
        </div>
        <p className="text-muted-foreground text-xs leading-relaxed">
          {card.description}
        </p>
        <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
          <Badge
            variant={
              card.category === "design"
                ? "primary"
                : card.category === "development"
                  ? "secondary"
                  : "outline"
            }
            className="pointer-events-none h-5 rounded-sm px-1.5 text-[11px] capitalize"
          >
            {card.category}
          </Badge>
          <Badge
            variant={
              card.priority === "high"
                ? "destructive"
                : card.priority === "medium"
                  ? "primary"
                  : "secondary"
            }
            className="pointer-events-none h-5 rounded-sm px-1.5 text-[11px] capitalize"
          >
            {card.priority}
          </Badge>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  )

  return (
    <SortableItem value={card.id} {...props}>
      {asHandle ? (
        <SortableItemHandle>{cardContent}</SortableItemHandle>
      ) : (
        cardContent
      )}
    </SortableItem>
  )
}
